${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:PinFeathers.NAME: Pin Feathers
${modID}:PinFeathers.FLAVOR: Strange feathers that grow into the skin of those normally chosen by the Flock.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if you have less than #b2 #yStrength, gain #b1 #yStrength.

${modID}:ClippedFeathers.NAME: Clipped Feathers
${modID}:ClippedFeathers.FLAVOR: Refined and controlled feathers, groomed to represent control over power and superiority.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces Pin Feathers. At the start of combat, gain #b1 #yRitual.

${modID}:WaxWings.NAME: Wax Wings
${modID}:WaxWings.FLAVOR: Fake wings made of wax and covered in feathers, worn by cultists of the Flock. Caw caw!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b2 #ySkyflight.

${modID}:BrokenCompass.NAME: Broken Compass
${modID}:BrokenCompass.FLAVOR: The broken compass of a lost adventurer. The needle slowly spins around like a clock.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b5 turns, take an extra turn.

${modID}:CultistCloak.NAME: Cultist Cloak
${modID}:CultistCloak.FLAVOR: A ruffled and feathery cloak, mass produced and dirty. Might offer a bit of protection.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b5 Block.

${modID}:SadimsFork.NAME: Sadim's Fork
${modID}:SadimsFork.FLAVOR: A lost relic of a forgotten god, said to never have touched the spire, but to have sent followers inside.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an attack deals damage to a non-minion enemy, apply #b1 #yGolden.

${modID}:CounterfeitCoinpurse.NAME: Counterfeit Coinpurse
${modID}:CounterfeitCoinpurse.FLAVOR: A coinpurse bearing the mark of a famous noble, though only a cheap copy of the real thing.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a shop, gain #b50 #yFool's #yGold that expires when leaving it.

${modID}:TaxNotice.NAME: Tax Notice
${modID}:TaxNotice.FLAVOR: An old notice for what looks like tax returns for vendors. Comes from the City, imposed by the Champ.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever you lose #yGold, lose #b25% more.

${modID}:HouseSlippers.NAME: House Slippers
${modID}:HouseSlippers.FLAVOR: Some cheap old slippers. Keeps your feet warm, and it's better than nothing.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a #rCurse to your deck, gain #b100 #yGold.
